mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Question (title, content, writerId, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
INSERT INTO Answer (questionId, content, writerId, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES (#{questionId}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, writerId, createdAt, updatedAt FROM Question ORDER BY id DESC
